title: The Great Old One
content:
eHur1 3 rays of fire. Each ray deals 2∼12 Fire damage.18m

3d8 ThunderDamage all nearby creatures and objects. Creatures made of inorganic material such as stone have Disadvantage on their Saving Throw

On Save: Targets still take half damage.18m CON Save

Phantasmal Force

Deal damage to a creature each turn. The type of damage changes to the last type the creature suffered.

18m INT Save Concentration

Curse a creature with your touch. The curse either bestows Disadvantage on checks and Saving
